title: Drawing, "Snow-covered Peak of Mount Chimborazo, Ecuador", July 1857
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on heavy greenish paper
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center:  Lugt 457e; again, at bottome center: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at lower right:  Chimborazo [written hurriedly and corrected:  Chimborazo
description: Horizontal view of the snow-covered peak of Mount Chimborazo, seen from same point as in 1917-4-1337.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Snow-covered Peak of Mount Chimborazo, Ecuador", July 1857.
July 1857. Graphite, brush and white gouache on heavy greenish paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1338.
